alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 1:09AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Benton and Washington Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 109 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Siloam Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Gentry... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Decatur... Greenland... Highfill... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 52 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
